import{SET_TEXT_FILTER,SET_START_DATE,SET_END_DATE,SORT_BY_AMOUNT,SORT_BY_DATE}from'../constants/filtersConstants';// SET_TEXT_FILTER
export var setTextFilter=function setTextFilter(){var text=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';return{type:SET_TEXT_FILTER,payload:text};};// SORT_BY_DATE
export var sortByDate=function sortByDate(){return{type:SORT_BY_DATE};};// SORT_BY_AMOUNT
